sentences.en: They lay on the firm sands, listening to the plaintive cry of the seagulls.
sentences.cn: 他们躺在坚实的沙滩上，听着海鸥的哀鸣。

sentences.en: Wendy was now almost overhead, and they could hear her plaintive cry.
sentences.cn: 温迪现在几乎就在头顶上了，他们听得见她哀怨的哭声。

sentences.en: Hark to the plaintive song of the old woman, to the call of the priests!
sentences.cn: 听老妇人哀怨的歌声，听祭师们的召唤吧！
